name: Accurate Attack
description: Trade effect DC for attack bonus.

name: All-out Attack
description: Trade active defense for attack bonus.

name: Chokehold
description: Suffocate an opponent you have successfully grabbed.

name: Close Attack
description: +1 bonus to close attack checks per rank.

name: Defensive Attack
description: Trade attack bonus for active defense bonus.

name: Defensive Roll
description: +1 active defense bonus to Toughness per rank.

name: Evasion
description: Circumstance bonus to avoid area effects.

name: Fast Grab
description: Make a free grab check after an unarmed attack.

name: Favored Environment
description: Circumstance bonus to attack or defense in an environment.

name: Grabbing Finesse
description: Substitute Dex for Str when making grab attacks.

name: Improved Aim
description: Double circumstance bonuses for aiming.

name: Improved Critical
description: +1 to critical threat range with an attack per rank.

name: Improved Defense
description: +2 bonus to active defense when you take the defend action.

name: Improved Disarm
description: No penalty for the disarm action.

name: Improved Grab
description: Make grab attacks with one arm. Not vulnerable while grabbing.

name: Improved Hold
description: –5 circumstance penalty to escape from your holds.

name: Improved Initiative
description: +4 bonus to initiative checks per rank.

name: Improved Smash
description: No penalty for the smash action.

name: Improved Trip
description: No penalty for the trip action.

name: Improvised Weapon
description: Use Unarmed Combat skill with improvised weapons, +1 damage bonus.

name: Move-by Action
description: Move both before and after your standard action.

name: Power Attack
description: Trade attack bonus for effect bonus.

name: Precise Attack
description: Ignore attack check penalties for either cover or concealment.

name: Prone Fighting
description: No penalties for fighting while prone.

name: Quick Draw
description: Draw a weapon as a free action.

name: Ranged Attack
description: +1 bonus to ranged attack checks per rank.

name: Redirect
description: Use Deception to redirect a missed attack at another target.

name: Set-up
description: Transfer the benefit of an interaction skill to an ally.

name: Takedown
description: Free extra attack when you incapacitate a minion.

name: Throwing Mastery
description: +1 damage bonus with thrown weapons per rank.

name: Uncanny Dodge
description: Not vulnerable when surprised or caught off-guard.

name: Weapon Bind
description: Free disarm attempt when you actively defend.

name: Weapon Break
description: Free smash attack when you actively defend.

name: Assessment
description: Use Insight to learn an opponent’s combat capabilities.

name: Benefit
description: Gain a significant prerequisite or fringe benefit.

name: Diehard
description: Automatically stabilize when dying.

name: Eidetic Memory
description: Total recall, +5 circumstance bonus to remember things.

name: Equipment
description: 5 points of equipment per rank.

name: Extraordinary Effort
description: Gain two benefits when using extra effort.

name: Fearless
description: Immune to fear effects.

name: Great Endurance
description: +5 on checks involving endurance.

name: Instant Up
description: Stand from prone as a free action.

name: Interpose
description: Take an attack meant for an ally.

name: Minion
description: Gain a follower or minion with (15 x rank) Character points.

name: Second Chance
description: Re-roll a failed check against a hazard once.

name: Sidekick
description: Gain a sidekick with (5 x rank) Character points.

name: Teamwork
description: +5 bonus to support team checks.

name: Trance
description: Go into a deathlike trance that slows bodily functions.

name: Agile Feint
description: Feint using Acrobatics skill or movement speed.

name: Animal Empathy
description: Use interaction skills normally with animals.

name: Artificer
description: Use Expertise: Magic to create temporary magical devices.

name: Attractive
description: Circumstance bonus to interaction based on your looks.

name: Connected
description: Call in assistance or favors with a Persuasion check.

name: Contacts
description: Make an initial Investigation check in one minute.

name: Daze
description: Use Deception or Intimidation to daze an opponent.

name: Fascinate
description: Use an interaction skill to entrance others.

name: Favored Foe
description: Circumstance bonus to checks against a type of opponent.

name: Hide in Plain Sight
description: Hide while observed without need for a diversion.

name: Improvised Tools
description: No penalty for using skills without tools.

name: Inventor
description: Use Technology to create temporary devices.

name: Jack-of-all-trades
description: Use any skill untrained.

name: Languages
description: Speak and understand additional languages.

name: Ritualist
description: Use Expertise: Magic to create and perform rituals.

name: Skill Mastery
description: Make routine checks with one skill under any conditions.

name: Startle
description: Use Intimidation to feint in combat.

name: Taunt
description: Use Deception to demoralize in combat.

name: Tracking
description: Use Perception to follow tracks.

name: Well-informed
description: Immediate Investigation or Persuasion check to know something.

name: Beginner’s Luck
description: Spend a Victory point to gain 5 temporary ranks in a skill.

name: Inspire
description: Spend a Victory point to grant allies a +1 circumstance bonus per rank.

name: Leadership
description: Spend a Victory point to remove a condition from an ally.

name: Luck
description: Re-roll a die roll once per rank.

name: Seize Initiative
description: Spend a Victory point to go first in the initiative order.

name: Ultimate Effort
description: Spend a Victory point to get an effective 20 on a specific check
